metadata.title: CVE-2023-44488 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
VP9 in libvpx before 1.13.1 mishandles widths, leading to a crash relatedto encoding.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-44488` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvpx9 - 1.12.0-1ubuntu2
vpx-tools - 1.12.0-1ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libvpx package in oracular was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.12.0-1ubuntu2').
